title: The Death of Captain America, Vol. 2: The Burden of Dreams
description: The Winter Soldier is being held prisoner by the Red Skull. While Sharon & the Falcon race to his rescue, they're about to cross paths with the Mighty Avenger that Tony Stark has sent hunting our rogue hero - the Black Widow! Will the Red Skull kill both Cap and Bucky?Collecting: Captain America 31-36
author: Ed Brubaker
